task.question: What request did Nehemiah make to the Lord besides that God remember him for what he did (Neh 13:14)?

choices.choice: That God bless his people Israel
That God forgive the sins of Israel
That God condemn Tobiah and Sanballat
That God not blot out what he had so faithfully done

task.answer: That God not blot out what he had so faithfully done

task.question: What did Nehemiah warn the men of Judah of (Neh 13:15)?

choices.choice: To close the gates of Jerusalem every night
Caring for the Levites and the priests
Drinking wine when they were in the temple

task.question: What did Nehemiah see the men of Judah doing on the Sabbath (Neh 13:15)?
What were the men of Tyre doing in Jerusalem (Neh 13:16)?

choices.choice: Buying the men of Judah as slaves
Cutting the cedars of Lebanon on the Sabbath

task.question: Who did Nehemiah say “What is this wicked thing you are doing—desecrating the Sabbath day?” to (Neh 13:17)?
To what did Nehemiah attribute all the calamity coming on Jerusalem (Neh 13:18)?

choices.choice: Not keeping the feasts of Israel

task.question: What did Nehemiah order to be done on the Sabbath (Neh 13:19)?

choices.choice: The people all appear at the temple
The gates to be shut until the Sabbath was over
The guards on the walls to not let anyone enter Jerusalem
The fields be abandoned on the Sabbath

task.answer: The gates to be shut until the Sabbath was over

task.question: Who spent the night by the walls of Jerusalem (Neh 13:20)?
How did Nehemiah threatened the merchants that spent the night outside of the walls (Neh 13:21)?

choices.choice: He would send his guards out after them
He would put them in prison
He would lay his hands on them

task.answer: He would lay his hands on them
